fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.examples.hem.equipments.hairdryer.sil.models

Class HairDryerSILUserModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.Model
      • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.AtomicModel
        • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.es.models.AtomicES_Model
          • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.examples.hem.equipments.hairdryer.sil.models.HairDryerSILUserModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SGMILModelImplementationI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.interfaces.EventsExchangingI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.interfaces.ModelDescriptionI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.interfaces.VariablesSharingI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.AtomicModelI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.ModelI, java.io.Serializable

    public class HairDryerSILUserModel
extends fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.es.models.AtomicES_Model
implements SGMILModelImplementationI
    The class HairDryerSILUserModel implements a simple user simulation model for the hair dryer example.

    Description

    In order to perform tit software-in-the-loop function, this model plans events that say when to change the operating mode of the hair dryer. The change itself is made by calling the corresponding services on the component. They will change the current operating mode, which will then be seen by the hair dryer SIL model, which in turn will update the electricity consumption and send an event to the electric meter with the new consumption.

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2020-01-20

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • HairDryerSILUserModel

        public HairDryerSILUserModel(java.lang.String uri,
                             java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit simulatedTimeUnit,
                             fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.simulators.interfaces.SimulatorI simulationEngine)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        create a hair dryer SIL user model instance.

        Contract

         pre    simulatedTimeUnit != null
 pre    simulationEngine == null ||
                        simulationEngine instanceof HIOA_AtomicEngine
 post   this.getURI() != null
 post   uri != null implies this.getURI().equals(uri)
 post   this.getSimulatedTimeUnit().equals(simulatedTimeUnit)
 post   simulationEngine != null implies
                        this.getSimulationEngine().equals(simulationEngine)
        Parameters:
        uri - unique identifier of the model.
        simulatedTimeUnit - time unit used for the simulation clock.
        simulationEngine - simulation engine enacting the model.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - TODO.
